entries.title: ‘Shot In The Arm’ Shows How Disinformation Can Be Deadly

entries.title: Tesla Owners Are Not Happy About Price Cuts: ‘Sobbing In The Fetal Position’
entries.description: “$69k no-USS having MYP owner here,” says a recent Model Y Performance purchaser in a Reddit threat, who’s also bemoaning the fact that Tesla recently removed ultrasonic sensors (USS) in favor of vision-driven proximity alerts. “This is wack.”
